name: Cluster Trump
description:
Let's make America great again with jumping from one truck to another in cluster traffic!

Cluster Trump is a game about daredevil parkour jumps from one truck to another.
Get ready for crazy parkour jumps in cluster traffic full of trucks that drive trow falling obstacles! Cluster Trump is for daredevil adrenaline fans. But be careful: trucks blow up if they flip over!

Features:
Great gameplay
Awesome graphics
Five super levels

Download Cluster Trump and play now!
